CustomField.formula: IF(INCLUDES( Worker_will_require__c , "Department"), "Department" + "," , NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( Worker_will_require__c , "End Date"), "End Date" + "," , NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( Worker_will_require__c , "First Name"), "First Name" + "," , NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( Worker_will_require__c , "Job Title"), "Job Title" + "," , NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( Worker_will_require__c , "Last Name"), "Last Name" + "," , NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( Worker_will_require__c , "Location"), "Location" + "," , NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( Worker_will_require__c , "Supervisor"), "Supervisor" + "," , NULL)
CustomField.label: Worker Changes Compilation
